author: adrianc
msg: Refactored Job implementations so they implement a state machine. This approach makes the code much simpler.

author: jlboudart
msg: Move register main artifact test to abstract-package module

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-3709: Cache the url list created from the ClusterState in CloudSolrServer on each request.
SOLR-3708: Add hashcode to ClusterState so that structures built based on the ClusterState can be easily cached.

author: rjung
msg: mod_ssl: Pass the server_rec to ssl_die() and use it to log a message to
the main error log, pointing to the appropriate virtual host error log.
